entry.title: Current Conditions: Sunny, -25.3°C

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 40 this morning and minus 17 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 14. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries late this evening and after midnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 14. Wind chill near minus 22. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of light snow. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of light snow beginning in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Thursday 02 March 2023
